title: Rolaak (Urdu)
author: Rafaqat Hayat
description: In this gripping 520-page masterpiece, Rafaqat Hayat takes you on a journey through the heart and soul of a young man yearning for freedom. The protagonist's struggle to break free from the shackles of tradition, where love and lovemaking are deemed sinful, is an intense exploration of human desires.

title: After Zionism
author: Antony Loewenstein
description: After Zionism brings together some of the world's leading thinkers on the Middle East question to dissect the century-long conflict between Zionism and the Palestinians, and to explore possible forms of a one-state solution

title: Qaum, Mulk, Sultanat
author: Ali Usman Qasmi
description:
The Making of Pakistan as a Homeland for Muslim
Pakistan as an Islamic Republic
